name: I Am Not Crazy
description:
NOTE:

The game takes place in the subconscious of the character while he is in a vegetative state. That's why there are places that are disproportionate to each other, its purpose is to end its vegetative life. Thus, the deceased can be reunited with his family.

STORY

After losing his daughter and wife, he became depressed and tried to kill himself many times. While she was unconscious, her head hit something hard and she went into a vegetative state.He didn't know where he was. All he wanted was to be reunited with his wife and daughter.He tried everything for her. 

                                                                          AND.....

"Our character is trying to kill himself in a vegetative state."

                                                                 

 

To kill yourself, you must do what is asked!

Screenwriter: Cihan Ozogul

CONTROLS

WASD to Move

CTRL - Crouch

Space - Jump

E to interact

F Flashlight
